title: WP_REST_API_Post
description: A post object in a REST API context.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

guid.description: The globally unique identifier for the object.

raw.description: GUID for the object, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: GUID for the object, transformed for display.

modified.description: The date the object was last modified, in the site's timezone.

modified_gmt.description: The date the object was last modified, as GMT.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the object.

type.description: Type of Post for the object.

password.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

permalink_template.description: Permalink template for the object. Only present when using the 'edit' context and the post type is public.

generated_slug.description: Slug automatically generated from the object title. Only present when using the 'edit' context and the post type is public.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the object. Only present for hierarchical post types.

raw.description: Title for the object, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: HTML title for the object, transformed for display.

raw.description: Content for the object, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: HTML content for the object, transformed for display.

block_version.description: Version of the content block format used by the object. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

protected.description: Whether the content is protected with a password.

author.description: The ID for the author of the object.

raw.description: Excerpt for the object, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: HTML excerpt for the object, transformed for display.

protected.description: Whether the excerpt is protected with a password.

featured_media.description: The ID of the featured media for the object.

comment_status.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object.

ping_status.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

sticky.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky. Only present for the 'post' post type.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the object.

categories.description: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy. Only present for post types that support categories.

tags.description: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy. Only present for post types that support tags.
